title: Am I responsible for my actions as a teenager? - Quora

response.answer_text: Legally, there are many things that you would not be considered responsible for. However, that does not give you free rein to do watery you want. As a person living in society, you have the basic responsibility to act like a decent person, to treat others the way you would like for them to treat you. Bring a teenager does not excuse you groom that responsibility. As a teenager, you are fully expected to make mistakes. That is part of growing up. Also parry of growing up is to own up to the mistakes that you make, learn from those mistakes and try to not repeat them I the future.

Yes. There is no sugar coating or long winded answer here. You will make error and mistakes, you will also do things well. All choices you make and act on are yours alone to make. You are responsible for you choices in life.
